players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and discovered he's the mafia. Charlie was killed by the mafia. We must arrest Bob now."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was not the mafia. We should investigate further."
You: "Bob, if you weren't mafia, why didn't you investigate Charlie? Diana's claim sounds solid. Let's vote Bob."
You: "Bob, detectives investigate dead players. You didn't. So you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. He didn't investigate Charlie. He knows I'm detective, but I have proof. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and discovered he's the mafia. Charlie was killed by the mafia. We must arrest Bob now."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was not the mafia. We should investigate further."
Alice: "Bob, if you weren't mafia, why didn't you investigate Charlie? Diana's claim sounds solid. Let's vote Bob."
Alice: "Bob, detectives investigate dead players. You didn't. So you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. He didn't investigate Charlie. He knows I'm detective, but I have proof. Vote Bob."
